posts.body: I started work on BlueCraft... (I just wiped my other fork I didn't like and used the same repo so I wouldn't have to go through the trouble of setting up another one lol)
scope creep is a BITCH I want my project to stay small FOREVER!!
r/FatLois is a subreddit, and now I REALLY wanna make r/FatAlex (Minecraft) since that would be fun to draw for... hm...

maybe I should try out painting, like my friend vivi. Not digital painting, physical painting. I think it might give more value to it, being an actual Thing I can hold and display instead of something in ma computer. we'll see :3 (below is their painting btw I like the vibe a lot)
BlueCraft will have a restricted worldsize of 64^3 (and will be based in indev)

bbw aurora borealis is quite the good 1.5 model

that is all

bluecraft will have blue hearts instead of red ones and an anime-girl-focused gameplay loop

this involves an XP bar that determines your breast size, farming rice and cooking tasty Japanese don, and killing monsters with your poggers sword

if I can figure out how to use mixins and where to put those mod files (some mod folder in the launcher directory? fabric b1.7.3 modloader??) then I can MAKE BLUECRAFT!! AND MAKE A WEBSITE FOR IT!!!!!! ALL MI MODS!!!!!!!!!1 XDDDDDDDDDD

-thoughts of the utterly deranged
bluecraft
a legacy minecraft blog would be. SO CUTE 😭
My special interests are eat food and fat woman

I'm back from Hungary (my back hurts like hell from the plane ride) so I can draw now. and that means: working on my trans fursona!! she's 33yo, 5'11" (same as me), and a mommy that only does what YOU want to do. also, she's very bottom-heavy, so her breasts aren't huge but her hips definitely are...

touhou is so cute, I wish I had cute characters like this to write a wiki on, like, old women that look like young women are so hot

"Her age on wikia is at least 30, implied closer to 50 but less than 60" BARS

Academy Of The Almost Immortal - an anime about demigod children in the heavenly realm learning how to become fiersome leaders to the humans in the earthy realm, containing scenes such as two of them mock-battling and the teacher only shouting "enough!" when one has been reduced to a barely-living pile of pulsating goo (which fully reforms after an hour or so)
UPDATE: actually NOT gonna port to HTML 3.0 because Javascript, is not a thing!! and my blog needs that to load the posts lol

I'm gonna redesign this entire site to use HTML 3.0 (like this site) and it's gonna be FIRE

why? I dunno it's cute
My First Girlfriend Is A Gal was a good anime (I fw nene so hard)

the amount of belonging I felt simply reclining in a small local café and enjoying an icecream and a coffee while being served by two nice older ladies is un-fucking-matched dude I was straight CHILLIN
I just want to document something. I want data. I want to make a wiki. I want an infatuation to fall back on when nothing else hits c'mon
I replaced tags with no tags lol, I made like one post with them and called it quites, totally not over site design or anything haa

I wanna be a coffee guy :3 (I am infatuated with the cute bag designs also I drink this stuff with like 50% french vanilla)

#coffeehead #eternal hobby search moment #soulsearch even?

yeah no I can't standardize because I can never to stick to one thing and consider it good especially when I'M doing it because I'm FUCKING STUPID AND SHOULD GO TO SLEEP AND I CAN'T EVEN PLAN A DECENT SLEEP SCHEDULE LET ALONE ANYTHING ELSE FUCK

#depressed as FUCK right now # I replaced header with tags btw

I love standardization so much I want to be like

Model:Anime Screencap Style 1.5 (beta)
Lora(s):Big Tiddies 1.5, Almost Pregart 1.5, Feet Galore 1.5
Steps:28 (30 when I'm feeling adventurous)

I'm definitely projecting my thoughts change with this one
I need to draw characters like this, acting out scenes and having Dynamics!! but I'm in Hungary so I can't art -> sad

I wanna buy a crucible (crucible in question) and melt down pennies and cast the molten brass into ingots

I literally just like Pure things lol
mommy
I wish I could lock her in my basement and do unspeakable acts to her body

I should be sleeping, but I'm not, because I feel like I should be working, and THAT feeling stems from the thought that nothing I've done is good right now, and so I should either work on it now or abandon it (both to make it 'easier' for future me) and honestly. this mindset is why I feel unaccomplished. I eep. I EEP #no sleep day 421 #my STR stat is at an all time low
the idea of social media is so. charming. delicate. "hey guys here's a picture I drew what do you think." so based

crazy oc design right here that I can share with all my oc-having friends and they'd all appreciate me and accept me as their own. btw I drew this with a trackpad

edit: fuck that should say tanaka

I could just become a hentai artist. convert this entire site into the place where I document and tag my hentai. make it all pretty and develop a style and cater to my audience while honing and enjoying my craft. I mean I'm kinda already doing that but also school is a thing idk. I just love data bro (porn)

im gonna do it I gotta this style looks so clean

women (from the mangas) will love me once I do

when I inevitably succumb to total depression (I can feel it, I'm losing my grip) I gotta remember two things:

  1. getting through the day's work (aka school) is fulfilling
  2. drawing thick asf anime women gives me micro-affection

oh and talking about stuff with others but I prefer Bottling so

me when I pretend I'm depressed for views hahaa
Ayano-san's Weight Gain Diary is a miracle and an inspiration to us all holy FUCK

humans are naturally inclined to incur benefits for themselves and their peers at the expense of others. we create systems that do so, and only push back against such systems in favour of ones that would benefit us more. in a trolley problem of resource distribution, you choose the familiar over the stranger. capitalism didn't create greed, greed created capitalism. now, morality exists, but it is inherently subjective: a homeless person demands cheap housing with the defense of it benefiting others like them (and themself); a rich person rejects cheap housing with the defense that it would hurt the economy for others (and themself)

this was a fun Discord discussion
I tried establishing a self-insert fic but am alreay bored of it lol, so I'll just dump it here. writing is fun! but I am potato

I'm in Hungary and I'm. so sick. I can't attend the Hungarian classes and I barely even feel like moving, watching youtube, and not to mention getting out of bed (even just to get water). kinda miserable, but at least I can vent about it here

I want a lángos so bad

prophecy: the year is 2029, the human genome has been available for experimentation for... six months now

they created a "make boobs bigger than beach balls" gene about two and a half hours after it was legalized

I'm in Hungary, the flight was long but nevertheless enjoyable, I watched baboons tear eachother limb from limb, also my bladder almost popped arriving at the hotel, also also I'm halfway to passing out right now since I haven't gotten a wink of sleep since waking up IN AMERICA

a slightly serious, mysterious, mild-horror (but still sexy) fic about thick babes working in space would be kinda cool

that is all

putting this idea here so I remember it for when I decide to implement it into my Minecraft fork Forever Indev

enchanting: you have an enchanter block (name pending), and have its UI literally just be the old villager UI. you exchange rupees to put an enchant on an item, and the amount of rupees needed varies based on the enchant and level. this makes it easily balance-able AND ALSO completely eliminates the annoying randomness, plus feels very RPG-y

anyways yea PRODUCTIVITY RELATED STRESS BEGONE!!!
slight site redesign (again lol)
I wanna get strong for a DOMMY MOMMY (plus that dude's build looks mega atractivo no homo tho) (also screw the car lol)
the era of koro is OVER. I've decided that Inugami Korone is NO LONGER the theme of this blog. She'll still stick around tho but y'know she won't be like a Main Point or whatever
Minecraft is so cool. I love items. I love sprites. I love the grid system. I love makin a lil world, a lil house. I like small things

this is Night she's my wife and I'm gonna write self insert fiction where she loves me through it all (and put it on my website) (im so lonely)

note that I actually still think photography is helping with my Feeling Useless all the time, but that's not gonna stop me from spawning Night into existence
knock on wood, but I think I'm gonna try picking up photography. if anything, it's a motivator to go outside more, and maybe fiddling with camera settings is more fufilling than Krita ones, lol

everything sucks. I wanna write. I wanna draw. I wanna get stuck to something. but I get bored of everything I do. I'm the opposite of lazy, I think. I hope!! I want to fill my heart with AI generated anime girls
I'm updating my site to have an old-internet messageboard feel. it even uses tables! how archaic lol

Smut story idea: Kitsune spirit woman invades your home to steal your food, and finds herself so successful in that endeavor that she decides to stay forever. Under spiritual law, this means she now owns you, your house, and is now your wife (you don't have a choice).

sometimes I get anxiety surrounding editing my Minecraft fork because I fear I might make a mistake or 'ruin' it, but I need to overcome those anxieties if I want to make something I truly feel proud of #metacognition

who knew when you enjoy art you enjoy art. zamn. I gonna do this more defo fr yes

here's the deviantart post btw

oh, to draw passionate of that being pictured and free from the concept of 'correctness,' hasty to experience (not endure) yet another design; to have art be a respite rather than a requirement with fufillments to be met (and inevitablely left unsatisfied); to be unbridled by expectation and eager to fail; I want to be that artist

cuz how will I draw like this otherwise

What if I just learned how to cook? Like, I'm hungry ALL the time, and I want to get delivery/fast food but it's just soo expensive. Pizza dough isn't that hard to make, though?? Like, what if I just made pizza whenever I was hungry. I'm gonna have my license soon. I can just buy ingredients.

(today is pizza day which is why I'm thinking of pizza)

I have fallen in love with Korone Inugami. Because I always fail to make an OC I like, I've decided I'd rather draw preexisting characters. Specifically, I want to hyperfixate on Korone, because I love her (design yup)!!

Hello World!! I'm designing this site off tumblr blogs since... I want a place to blog but prefer websites tbh. This is like my personal journal that you just so happen to be reading.

Uh, the post dates represent the time I first made that post, but I like optimizing things so I may rewrite posts after I've made them idfk
